page.title: 02POLEBROOK C.E. PRIMARY SCH.
page.content: In Polebrook School we have got three classrooms. Our teachers are Mrs. Berry, Mr. Norwood and Mrs. Rowe. Mrs. Berry teaches the youngest class, Mr. Norwood teaches the middle class, and Mrs. Rowe teaches the oldest children. There are seventy-two children in the school. Mrs Lack cooks the dinner. Mrs. Hart and Mrs. Blake are the dinner ladies. Mrs. Chester is the caretaker. The school has an old building and joined to it is a new building. The oldest part was built over 100 years ago, while the two infant classrooms, the hall and the kitchen were added seventeen years ago. We have got a playground. It has got yellow lines on it. We have got a playing field and I play tig on the field with my friends.
